data.prayer: Over 38.03 percent of the people of Kriva Palanka are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kriva Palanka, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kriva Palanka, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Kriva Palanka, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kriva Palanka
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 14,600 people living in the state of Kriva Palanka.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Albanian, Macedonian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Kriva Palanka, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Kriva Palanka, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kriva Palanka, North Macedonia has a population of 14,600.

We estimate Kriva Palanka has 24 people who might know Jesus, 9,024 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,552 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 608 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Kriva Palanka. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
